content: शक्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [शक्-क्त] {@--1@} Able, capable, competent (with <ab>gen.</ab> or <ab>loc.</ab> or <ab>inf.</ab>); बहवोऽस्य कर्मणः शक्ताः <ls>Ve. 3</ls>; तस्योपकारे शक्तस्त्वं किं जीवन् किमुतान्यथा {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%} {@--2@} Strong, mighty, powerful. {@--3@} Rich, opulent; <ls>Ms. 11. 9.</ls> {@--4@} Significant, expressive, conveying a meaning by denotation ( अभिधा or शक्ति) and not by indication (लक्षणा) (as a word). {@--5@} Clever, intelligent. {@--6@} Speaking kindly or agreeably.
